text: The essential oil from the leaves of Juniperus oxycedrus L . of the Iberian flora , mainly constituted by α - pinene , showed a great inhibition of IL - 1 - induced NO production in the human chondrocytic cell line C - 28 / 12 . The same oil and a α - pinene - rich fraction reduced markedly IL - 1 - induced IκBα degradation and phosphorylation , NF - κB - DNA binding activity and NO production [ 152 ] .
